description: A CSS module for styling the search component of a todo list application. This file contains variable declarations for colors, fonts, and spacing, along with styles for various elements within the search interface.

classes.name: screen
classes.description: Styles for the main search screen layout.

classes.name: statusBar
classes.description: Styles for the status bar at the top of the search component.

classes.name: header
classes.description: Sticky header styles for the search component.

classes.name: iconBtn
classes.description: Styles for icon buttons used in the search component.

classes.name: searchWrap
classes.description: Wrapper styles for search input area.

classes.name: searchInput
classes.description: Styles for the input field of the search.

classes.name: clearBtn
classes.description: Styles for the clear button visible when text is present.

classes.name: chips
classes.description: Styles for a chip component that may display selected search filters.

classes.name: chip
classes.description: Styles for individual chips that represent search filters.

classes.name: active
classes.description: Styles applied when a chip is in an active state.

classes.name: sectionTitle
classes.description: Styles for titles of sections within search results.

classes.name: results
classes.description: Styles for the results container.

classes.name: resultCard
classes.description: Styles for each result card displayed in the search results.

classes.name: resultThumb
classes.description: Styles for the thumbnail image in a result card.

classes.name: resultInfo
classes.description: Container styles for the result information.

classes.name: resultTitle
classes.description: Styles for the title of each result in the search.

classes.name: resultMeta
classes.description: Styles for meta information below the result titles.

classes.name: metaGroup
classes.description: Styles for grouping meta information elements.

classes.name: resultAction
classes.description: Styles for action elements in a result card.

classes.name: ratingBadge
classes.description: Styles for the badge displaying the rating of a search result.

classes.name: bookmarkBtn
classes.description: Styles for a button that bookmarks a result.

classes.name: emptyState
classes.description: Styles for the empty state message when there are no search results.
